data.eml:eml: Katianna maryae n. sp. (Collembola: Katiannidae), a southern Appalachian species of a Gondwanan genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bernard, Ernest C. (2014): Katianna maryae n. sp. (Collembola: Katiannidae), a southern Appalachian species of a Gondwanan genus. Zootaxa 3754 (2): 148-158, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.2.4
